casebody.data:
ETHOS TECHNOLOGIES, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. REALNETWORKS, INC., Defendant-Appellee. No. 2006-1552. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 8, 2007.

Before MICHEL, Chief Judge, MAYER and GAJARSA, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is

ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
